name: The Order
description:
The Order

XCOM-like turn-based stategy.

ENGINE

Game is creating on Unity engine, because it's very simple engine for beginners and easy import to android. Writing uses C#.

STORY

Demons try to invade in your world and you need to stop them! You're the head of the Ancient Order and defender of your world

GAME MECHANIC

Main idea inspaired by XCOM. But

  • Focus on melee fights. It is the Middle Ages - What did you expect? Just swing your sword and hope to survive. Always think about location of soldiers - it's very important! because mainly you can attack from very close distance.
  • Your soliders will die it's war. - Finish game without losses? Forget about this. Prepare to lose half of your units
  • 4 Damage type - pierce, slash, axe, crush. Choose your equipment against enemy. Tryng to kill the stone golem with a knife - bad idea
Interface

Not it looks realy bad, but we will fix it.

Windows:

Map description - cover type, gold, etc.

Barracks - equipment and skills.

Progress - missons.

Squad redactor - choosing units and etc. Just tap on autodraft.

SOrry

We still not add boss in game so you can't win, just give up and die!. It's only for now.

Thank you for attention and follow if you're interested!

P.S. Wirte your feedback in comments, and report about bugs. Thanks!
